main_definition: Extremely large or great in size, amount, degree, force, importance, etc.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Exceptionally large in size or extent
meanings_and_examples.example: The Great Wall of China is a tremendous structure that stretches over 13,000 miles.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Excelling greatly; outstanding in quality or quantity
meanings_and_examples.example: She received a tremendously high score on her exam, earning her an A+ grade.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Causing great fear or alarm; producing strong emotions of excitement or anxiety
meanings_and_examples.example: The roller coaster ride was so thrilling that it left everyone feeling tremendous exhilaration.
His performance in the play received a standing ovation, and his portrayal of the character was truly tremendous.
